member.name: T:Bmi.BmiCalculator
member.summary: This class provides a function to calculate the BMI of any individual, based on body parameters: height, weight.

member.name: M:Bmi.BmiCalculator.GetBmi(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the BMI of an individual based on their weight and height.
member.param: The weight of the individual in kilograms.
The height of the individual in meters.
